mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ITEM_ID DESC) AS RN, ITEM_CTG.* FROM ITEM_CTG ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{pagination.start} AND #{pagination.end}
SELECT * FROM ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_ID DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM ITEM a LEFT JOIN ITEM_CTG b ON a.ITEM_ID = b.ITEM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ITEM_STATUS = 100
AND b.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b.MAIN_CTG LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b.SUB_CTG LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND a.ITEM_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT a.*, b.* FROM ITEM a LEFT JOIN ITEM_CTG b ON a.ITEM_ID = b.ITEM_ID WHERE a.ITEM_ID = #{itemId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.MEMBER_ID, b.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.ITEM_ID DESC) AS RN FROM ITEM a LEFT JOIN ITEM_CTG b ON a.ITEM_ID = b.ITEM_ID WHERE a.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) sub WHERE RN BETWEEN #{pagination.start} AND #{pagination.end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.MEMBER_ID, b.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.ITEM_ID DESC) AS RN FROM ITEM a LEFT JOIN ITEM_CTG b ON a.ITEM_ID = b.ITEM_ID WHERE a.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) sub WHERE RN BETWEEN #{pagination.start} AND #{pagination.end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEM a LEFT JOIN ITEM_CTG b ON a.ITEM_ID = b.ITEM_ID WHERE a.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM_CTG SET ITEM_NAME = #{itemName}, ITEM_PRICE = #{itemPrice}, MAIN_CTG = #{mainCtg}, SUB_CTG = #{subCtg}, ORIGIN = #{origin} WHERE ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
